title: Why does OCE fear change?
body:
Another thread deleted for absolutely no reason. If you guys are so convinced that your community is being ruined why are you so opposed to change? I am trying to help you guys move away from this inferiority complex that's corrupting the OCE community, but it seems you guys would rather want things to stay as they are. I understand that you guys don't know how to do anything other than complain and play the victim, but it doesn't have to be that way. Together we can make OCE great ~~again~~ for the first time!

We gotta make a change.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9ZeTJ3PoXTI
